items.name: Alcohol dehydrogenase (RADH) from Ralstonia sp.
items.production_organism: E. coli BL21(DE3) from Novagen (Madison, WI)
items.purification_method: Size exclusion chromatography (SEC) and anion exchange chromatography
items.special_treatment: Purified with defined concentrations of CaCl2 (0.2 and 0.8 mmol L-1) to maintain stability, stored in different conditions for testing stability.
